CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE dbo.P_APReturnAmount( @CompanyID int, @RefNbr nvarchar(15), @DocType nvarchar(5), @ProjectID int = null, @BranchID int = null, @TaskID int = null, @InventoryID int = null, @ReturnValue decimal(18,3) out ) AS BEGIN IF @ProjectID is null SELECT @ReturnValue = dr.CuryOrigDocAmt FROM APRegister r Inner Join APRegisterKvExt rx on r.CompanyID = rx.CompanyID and r.NoteID =rx.RecordID and rx.FieldName = 'AttributeDJNBR' Inner Join APRegister dr on r.CompanyID = dr.CompanyID and rx.ValueString = dr.RefNbr and dr.DocType = 'ADR' Where r.CompanyID = @CompanyID and r.RefNbr = @RefNbr and r.DocType = @DocType ELSE SELECT @ReturnValue = Sum(dt.CuryTranAmt) FROM APRegister r Inner Join APRegisterKvExt rx on r.CompanyID = rx.CompanyID and r.NoteID =rx.RecordID and rx.FieldName = 'AttributeDJNBR' Inner Join APRegister dr on r.CompanyID = dr.CompanyID and rx.ValueString = dr.RefNbr and dr.DocType = 'ADR' Inner Join APTran dt on dr.CompanyID = dt.CompanyID and dr.RefNbr = dt.RefNbr and dr.DocType = dt.TranType Where r.CompanyID = @CompanyID and r.RefNbr = @RefNbr and r.DocType = @DocType and dt.BranchID = @BranchID and dt.ProjectID = @ProjectID and dt.InventoryID = @InventoryID and (dt.TaskID = @TaskID Or (dt.TaskID is null And @TaskID is null))
IF @ReturnValue Is Null Set @ReturnValue = 0; RETURN; END
